document.discussion_title: BNP Paribas Reiterates “Neutral” Rating for Capita PLC (CPI)
document.topic_text: Tweet Capita PLC (LON:CPI) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating reiterated by BNP Paribas in a note issued to investors on Monday. They presently have a GBX 950 ($12.23) price target on the stock. BNP Paribas’ target price would indicate a potential downside of 6.50% from the company’s current price. Shares of Capita PLC ( LON:CPI ) opened at 1024.00 on Monday. The stock has a 50 day moving average of GBX 968.77 and a 200-day moving average of GBX 1,023.42. Capita PLC has a one year low of GBX 839.00 and a one year high of GBX 1,306.00. The stock’s market capitalization is GBX 6.81 billion. The business also recently disclosed a dividend, which will be paid on Wednesday, November 30th. Investors of record on Thursday, October 20th will be paid a dividend of GBX 11.10 ($0.14) per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, October 20th. This represents a dividend yield of 1.14%. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/bnp-paribas-reiterates-neutral-rating-for-capita-plc-cpi/ A number of other equities analysts have also weighed in on CPI. Jefferies Group decreased their target price on Capita PLC from GBX 1,370 ($17.64) to GBX 1,340 ($17.25) and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research report on Tuesday, May 3rd. Barclays PLC reissued an “equal weight” rating and issued a GBX 1,235 ($15.90) target price on shares of Capita PLC in a research report on Monday, May 9th. Panmure Gordon reissued a “sell” rating and issued a GBX 900 ($11.59) target price on shares of Capita PLC in a research report on Tuesday, May 10th. Peel Hunt reissued a “hold” rating and issued a GBX 1,087 ($14.00) target price on shares of Capita PLC in a research report on Tuesday, May 10th. Finally, Shore Capital reissued a “hold” rating on shares of Capita PLC in a research report on Tuesday, May 10th. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, ten have given a hold rating and five have assigned a buy rating to the company’s stock. Capita PLC presently has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average target price of GBX 1,109.31 ($14.28). Capita PLC is a United Kingdom-based company, which creates and delivers services in business process management. The Company’s segments include Digital & Software Solutions, Integrated Services, Local Government, Property & Health, Workplace Services, IT Enterprise Services, Asset Services, Customer Management, Capita Europe and Insurance & Benefits Services. Receive News & Ratings for Capita PLC Capita PLC
